sentences.sentence: This year he has left for St Louis early to acclimatise himself.
sentences.translation: 今年他早早地前往圣路易斯以便适应新环境。

sentences.sentence: The upshot of this is that players must also acclimatise to the flight of the ball.
sentences.translation: 这样的结果就是球员们必须也要适应足球的飞行。

sentences.sentence: Anthony began his running on Thursday with several laps to acclimatise himself to the RA108.
sentences.translation: 周四，安东尼开始了试车，他先跑了几圈热身圈，以熟悉 RA108 赛车。
